altername_name: Shokugyou Taiken Adventure: 13-sai no Hello Work DS
name: 13-Sai No Hello Work DS
overview: 13-Sai no Hello Work DS is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Digital Works Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 2008. In 13-Sai no Hello Work, you play a 13 year old robot girl from the future and try out a number of different jobs
